item.title: Indra's Pearl, or Quasifuschian Two Generator Groups explained by someone completely out of his depths
item.description: A few months back I started reading Indra’s Pearl by Mumford, Series and Wright. The book is amazing, and I’m not scared to say it’s one of my favorite books about Maths that I’ve ever read. I wanted to get my hands dirty and implement some of the fractals in the book, since they were very different from the usual “Mandelbrot and cousins” fractals: they were truly out of this world.
